4001+4002+4003+........+5998+5999+6000 = ?
Pakai Aritmatika
4001+4002+4003+........+5998+5999+6000 = Sn
4001+4002+4003+........+5998+5999+6000 = (n/2)(2a+(n-1)b)
a : suku pertama
b : beda 
n : banyaknya suku
4001+4002+4003+........+5998+5999+6000 = (2000/2)(2.4001+(2000-1)1)
4001+4002+4003+........+5998+5999+6000 = (1000)(8002+1999)
4001+4002+4003+........+5998+5999+6000 = (1000)(10001)
4001+4002+4003+........+5998+5999+6000 = 10001000
